mapper.insert: INSERT INTO commentarticle( createdDate, lastModified, comment, login_loginNo, article_articleId) VALUES (now(), now(), #{comment}, #{login_loginNo}, #{article_articleId})
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, l.userId FROM commentarticle as c left join article as a on a.articleId = c.article_articleId left join login as l on l.loginNo = c.login_loginNo WHERE article_articleId = #{article_articleId}
